channel.title: youtube on Nubeblog
channel.description: Recent content in youtube on Nubeblog

item.title: 3D Mailbox, is this a joke?
item.description: I recently found a review of a new email application name 3D Mailbox. And that’s what you think: an application to read your email in a tridimensional environment. Can sound stupid, but it looks even more stupid when you watch the trailer: It’s crystal clear that Venture Capital investors do not know what to do with their pockets full of money. And no, it’s not a joke.

item.title: YouTube comprises 10% traffic on the Internet
item.description: I have just read this report from ellacoya networks. It explains how http traffic has overtaken p2p traffic thanks to video and audio streaming. And YouTube comprises 10% of whole internet traffic, and more than 20% of http! I could never imagine that YouTube is so big. But what it makes me wonder how much time people waste in YouTube daily, and how it affects productivity.
